template.name: MOXA AWK-3131A by SNMP
template.description: Template for monitoring MOXA AWK-3131A devices via SNMP

item.name: Number of network interfaces
item.description: The number of network interfaces present on this system (ifNumber.0)

item.name: System Contact
item.description: The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact that person (sysContact.0)

trigger.expression: nodata(/MOXA AWK-3131A by SNMP/snmp.get[sysContact.0],1h)=1 or last(/MOXA AWK-3131A by SNMP/snmp.get[sysContact.0])=""
trigger.name: System Contact is not set on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: System Contact (sysContact.0) is empty or not available for 1 hour.

item.name: System Location
item.description: The physical location of this node (e.g., 'telephone closet, 3rd floor') (sysLocation.0)

trigger.expression: nodata(/MOXA AWK-3131A by SNMP/snmp.get[sysLocation.0],1h)=1 or last(/MOXA AWK-3131A by SNMP/snmp.get[sysLocation.0])=""
trigger.name: System Location is not set on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: System Location (sysLocation.0) is empty or not available for 1 hour.

item.name: Device name
item.description: An administratively-assigned name for this managed node (sysName.0)

item.name: System Object ID
item.description: The vendor's authoritative identification of the network management subsystem contained in the entity (sysObjectID.0)

trigger.expression: last(/MOXA AWK-3131A by SNMP/snmp.get[sysObjectID.0],#1)<>last(/MOXA AWK-3131A by SNMP/snmp.get[sysObjectID.0])
trigger.name: System Object ID has changed on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: System Object ID is different than it was before.

item.name: System OID Last Change
item.description: The value of sysUpTime at the time this entry was last added or modified (sysORLastChange.0)

item.name: System Services
item.description: A value which indicates the services offered by this entity (sysServices.0)

trigger.expression: last(/MOXA AWK-3131A by SNMP/snmp.get[sysServices.0],#1)<>last(/MOXA AWK-3131A by SNMP/snmp.get[sysServices.0])
trigger.name: System services have changed on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: The system services offered by the device have changed.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Admin status
item_prototype.description: The desired state of the interface (ifAdminStatus.{#SNMPINDEX})

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Inbound broadcast packets
item_prototype.description: The number of broadcast packets delivered to a higher-layer protocol (ifHCInBroadcastPkts.{#SNMPINDEX})

trigger_prototype.name: High inbound broadcast packet rate on interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS})
trigger_prototype.description: The rate of inbound broadcast packets on interface {#IFNAME} is high.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Inbound discards
item_prototype.description: The number of inbound packets that were chosen to be discarded even though no errors had been detected to prevent their being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol (ifInDiscards.{#SNMPINDEX})

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Inbound errors
item_prototype.description: The number of inbound packets that contained errors preventing them from being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol (ifInErrors.{#SNMPINDEX})

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Inbound multicast packets
item_prototype.description: The number of multicast packets delivered to a higher-layer protocol (ifHCInMulticastPkts.{#SNMPINDEX})

trigger_prototype.name: High inbound multicast packet rate on interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS})
trigger_prototype.description: The rate of inbound multicast packets on interface {#IFNAME} is high.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Inbound unicast packets
item_prototype.description: The number of unicast packets delivered to a higher-layer protocol (ifHCInUcastPkts.{#SNMPINDEX})

trigger_prototype.name: High inbound unicast packet rate on interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS})
trigger_prototype.description: The rate of inbound unicast packets on interface {#IFNAME} is high.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Inbound traffic
item_prototype.description: The total number of octets received on the interface, including framing characters (ifHCInOctets.{#SNMPINDEX})

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Last change
item_prototype.description: The value of sysUpTime at the time this entry was last added or modified (ifLastChange.{#SNMPINDEX})

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): MTU
item_prototype.description: The size of the largest datagram that can be sent on the interface, in octets (ifMtu.{#SNMPINDEX})

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Outbound broadcast packets
item_prototype.description: The total number of packets that higher-level protocols requested be transmitted as broadcast on this interface (ifHCOutBroadcastPkts.{#SNMPINDEX})

trigger_prototype.name: High outbound broadcast packet rate on interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS})
trigger_prototype.description: The rate of outbound broadcast packets on interface {#IFNAME} is high.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Outbound discards
item_prototype.description: The number of outbound packets that were chosen to be discarded even though no errors had been detected to prevent their being transmitted (ifOutDiscards.{#SNMPINDEX})

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Outbound errors
item_prototype.description: The number of outbound packets that could not be transmitted because of errors (ifOutErrors.{#SNMPINDEX})

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Outbound multicast packets
item_prototype.description: The total number of packets that higher-level protocols requested be transmitted as multicast on this interface (ifHCOutMulticastPkts.{#SNMPINDEX})

trigger_prototype.name: High outbound multicast packet rate on interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS})
trigger_prototype.description: The rate of outbound multicast packets on interface {#IFNAME} is high.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Outbound unicast packets
item_prototype.description: The total number of packets that higher-level protocols requested be transmitted as unicast on this interface (ifHCOutUcastPkts.{#SNMPINDEX})

trigger_prototype.name: High outbound unicast packet rate on interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS})
trigger_prototype.description: The rate of outbound unicast packets on interface {#IFNAME} is high.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Outbound traffic
item_prototype.description: The total number of octets transmitted out of the interface, including framing characters (ifHCOutOctets.{#SNMPINDEX})

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Speed
item_prototype.description: The current bandwidth of the interface in bits per second (ifSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX})

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Operational status
item_prototype.description: The current operational state of the interface (ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX})

trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}) is down
trigger_prototype.description: Operational status of interface {#IFNAME} is down.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Type
item_prototype.description: The type of interface, as defined in the IANAifType-MIB (ifType.{#SNMPINDEX})

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/MOXA AWK-3131A by SNMP/net.if.speed[ifSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}])<100000000 and last(/MOXA AWK-3131A by SNMP/net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}])=1
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}) has low speed (current: {ITEM.VALUE})
trigger_prototype.description: The interface {#IFNAME} speed is less than 100 Mbps while operational.
